1: <pb/><e>Bit yet David chi bitnelay yet chi ajtok eb israel bay Jerusalén.</e> <pb/><t>Manxa jantakok tzalojc'ulalil yet max yalon eb ayin: ¡Ton bay yatut Jehová! ẍi eb.</t>
2: <t>Axa tinani', ayonxa ec' bay yul conob Jerusalén ti'.</t>
3: <t>A Jerusalén, watx'nebil yin junnej conobal yayji.</t>
4: <t>A bay jun conob ti' chi jay eb is conoblak Jehová, yet watx' chi bitnelay Cham, axca yutnak yaloncan bay eb jichmam.</t>
5: <t>A bay jun conob ti' ay juzgadolak bay chi beyc'ulnewi eb yinatil rey David yin tojolal.</t>
6: <pb/><t>Alek yin masanil e c'ul: Ayokab junc'ulal bay Jerusalén; junc'ulalokab ay eb chi camc'ulnen jun conob ti'.</t>
7: <t>¡Ayokab junc'ulal yin is murallail c'al bay nalakil is reyal! quex chi.</t>
8: <pb/><t>Yuj watx'ilok eb wican c'al eb wet conob xan ok wala': Ayokab junc'ulal, quin chi.</t>
9: <t>Yuj watx'ilok is templo Jehová co Diosal, xan ok wak' wip yuj is watx'ilok Jerusalén ti'.</t>
